lead_paragraph: Bills receiver Josh Reed was released from a Buffalo-area hospital yesterday, two days after sustaining a bruised kidney. In announcing Reed’s release, the Bills did not provide an update of his condition or whether he would be able to play in Buffalo’s game at Indianapolis on Sunday.
